content.text: Hey, I am so glad I met you at the party yesterday. It was a lot of fun. I am not really good at meeting new people, but you were really easy to talk to.
Thank you so much! I am glad I could make you feel that way! I love meeting new people and hearing about their lives. It is so interesting to learn about different people.
I agree! I think it is so important to be open to new experiences. I am trying to be more open about who I am and what I like to do.
That is great! I think it is really important to be yourself. I am always myself and I think that is why I have such a good time meeting new people.
I admire that! I think I am going to try to be more like you. I love your hoodie by the way. It is so cool!
Thank you so much! I love it too. I got it at Comic Con last year.
Oh, cool! I have never been to Comic Con. Is it fun?
It is so much fun! I love dressing up as my favorite characters and meeting people who are just as passionate about the things I am passionate about.
That sounds awesome! I think I might have to check it out sometime.
You definitely should! I think you would have a great time.
